alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 2:52PM MDT until April 07 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first High Wind Warning, north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the second High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility reduced at times due to areas of blowing dust. * WHERE...Eastern Kiowa County, Lamar Vicinity/Prowers County and Springfield Vicinity/Baca County Counties. * WHEN...For the first High Wind Warning, until 7 PM MDT this evening. For the second High Wind Warning, from 11 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
